  • Modules

00500_mcOpenSession
[Normal_Client_API]

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection
  4. Trusted Application TlIntegrationTest
    1. Trusted Application copied to Android on Test device in as 05010000000000000000000000000000.tlbin
    2. Trusted Application runnable and bug-free

Generic preconditions (setup)
Generic Preconditions are the same for every test case. They are executed always in front of every single test case.

  • open device using the default ID by calling mcOpenDevice()
  • allocate a WSM buffer (4k)
  • open a session to the Trusted Application

Generic post processing (teardown)
Generic post processing is the same for every test case. It is executed always after every single test case.

  • close session to the Trusted Application
  • free allocated memory of WSM buffer
  • close Device by calling mcCloseDevice()
